resources.string: Enter an SQL query to be run by SQLite
Scroll up/down left/right through query results

This app was built as a hobby project to incorporate the sqlite3 database from the cool SQL Murder Mystery found here: http://mystery.knightlab.com/ . You should definitely check out the site as the implementation on the website is far superior to this one.

To play this game you need to know some SQL syntax to query the underlying sqlite3 database in this app. More information can be found here: http://mystery.knightlab.com/ Check the schema button in the options menu to see what tables are included in this database.
